title: Verify: Migrate Frontend to Vite and Tailwind
description:
Run automated tests for task T-046.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Migrate frontend build tool from CRA to Vite 6. Replace CSS modules with Tailwind CSS 4 and integrate shadcn/ui. Ensure build and dev workflows work.
Criteria:
- Frontend builds and runs with Vite
- Tailwind and shadcn/ui are integrated
- No CSS modules remain
- UI renders correctly
acceptance_criteria: Frontend builds and runs with Vite
